text: not sure if this has been asked before - but can blogs on HubSpot have 2 or more languages? it's for a multinational company which has blogs externally from HS because of this translation issue. workarounds? :confused:

with our clients when they want blogs in different languages we’ve just been creating multiple blogs. usually it doesn’t make sense to use 1 blog for all languages, because usually someone speaking searching for something in Chinese is not located in the U.S. so the content that makes sense for them to see is usually not the same as someone speaking English.

So often they will only get articles translated to the relevant languages or reposted to the relevant regions.

There are services that do integrate with HubSpot for translation that can do “automatic” translation for HubSpot sites and blogs but they often cost a fair amount of money.

(I say automatic, because the better quality ones actually have actual people verify the translations and it’s not instantaneous because of it, but usually results in way better translation.)
